>Business Analyst
content.text: Providing organisations the tools and understanding for rejection or justifying technological solutions to benefit the business and the customer needs and desires.

content.heading: Customer Service Practitioner
content.text: Advising organisations on best practice, how to measure performance and justify changes to processes and approaches.

content.heading: Customer Service Specialist
content.text: Advising organisations on best practice, how to measure performance and justify changes to processes and approaches.

content.heading: Data Analyst
content.text: Supporting customers to understand how to retrieve data from a variety of sources, combine to inform to enable business making decisions.

content.heading: Data Technician
content.text: Supporting customers to understand how to retrieve data from a variety of sources, combine to inform to enable business making decisions.

content.heading: Digital Support Technician
content.text: Provision of training and advice to super users in a variety of sectors.

content.heading: Engineering Fitter
content.text: Followed an indentured, traditional apprenticeship and further experience in control and instrumentation.

content.heading: Engineering Operative
content.text: Vast experience in the manufacturing of communcation equipment with leading industry names.

content.heading: Information Communications Technician
content.text: Many years working in the ICT industry, initially starting with analague and digital devices leading on to VoIP and SIP, virtualisation and coding.

content.heading: Infrastructure Technician
content.text: Designing, installing and supporting a variety of products and services inclusing networking, virtualisation, cloud and on-premise solutions.

content.heading: IT Technical Salesperson
content.text: Presales and solution architecture is one of my main skills, keeping approaches personable and describing intricate technologies to clients with a variety of levels of technical understanding.

content.heading: Network Engineer
content.text: VoIP, SIP and integration to clients networks has meant a broad undertsanding to implement a new solution to their existing network.

content.heading: Team Leader Supervisor
content.text: Team lead for an international technical suppoort team in an AI leading organisation in the communication sector.

content.heading: Unified Communications Technician
content.text: A plethora of experience in the communciations industry, including the design, delivery and support of a variety of solutions.
